quotes.author: Steve Jobs
quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.

quotes.author: Walt Disney
quotes.quote: The best way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.

quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller
quotes.quote: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.

quotes.author: Herman Cain
quotes.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
